item.title: Introduction to Data Science with R
item.description: It’s ok to lose to opponent. It’s never okay to lose to fear.. — Nariyoshi Miyagi, Karate Kid (1984) Prologue: The rules of the game Marty: Hey, Doc, you better back up, we don’t have enough road to get up to 88.
